actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit

official_title: To properly balance the wind and water erosion criteria and the wildlife suitability criteria to be used in the 18th signup of land in the conservation reserve program.

summary.text: States that highly erodible lands that meet specified wind and water erosion criteria and have an established plant cover shall be deemed to meet specified wildlife criteria and receive maximum wildlife points with respect to conservation reserve signups.

titles.title: To properly balance the wind and water erosion criteria and the wildlife suitability criteria to be used in the 18th signup of land in the conservation reserve program.
